statements: SELECT * FROM backstage_schedules;
SELECT id, event_date, event_time FROM backstage_schedules WHERE id = 3;
SELECT hair_stylist_name, makeup_artist_name, dresser_name FROM backstage_schedules WHERE event_date = '2022-12-15';
SELECT task_description FROM backstage_schedules WHERE makeup_artist_name = 'Emma Stone';
SELECT event_date, event_time, task_description FROM backstage_schedules WHERE dresser_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT * FROM backstage_schedules WHERE event_time > '12:00:00' AND event_date = '2022-05-20';
SELECT id, event_date, hair_stylist_name FROM backstage_schedules WHERE task_description LIKE '%hair%';
SELECT makeup_artist_name, dresser_name FROM backstage_schedules WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-04-15' AND '2022-04-30';
SELECT * FROM backstage_schedules WHERE hair_stylist_name = 'Alice' OR makeup_artist_name = 'Bob';
SELECT id, event_date, event_time, task_description FROM backstage_schedules WHERE dresser_name = 'Jane' ORDER BY event_date DESC, event_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM Stylists WHERE specialty = 'Haircut'
SELECT id, name, specialty FROM Stylists ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT email FROM Stylists WHERE id = 3
SELECT * FROM Logistics WHERE event_date = '2022-10-15'
SELECT event_name, location, start_time, end_time FROM Logistics ORDER BY start_time ASC
SELECT name, specialty FROM Stylists WHERE id = 1
SELECT * FROM Stylists ORDER BY specialty ASC
SELECT name, phone_number FROM Stylists WHERE specialty = 'Hair Stylist'
SELECT id, name, email, phone_number FROM Stylists WHERE specialty = 'Makeup Artist'
SELECT id, name, specialty, email FROM Stylists
SELECT * FROM Stylists
SELECT stylist_id, specialty, name, availability FROM Stylists
SELECT name, stylist_id, availability, specialty FROM Stylists
SELECT * FROM MakeupArtists
SELECT artist_id, experience_years, name, availability FROM MakeupArtists
SELECT * FROM Stylists ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, specialty, availability FROM Stylists WHERE specialty = 'Hair Styling';
SELECT * FROM MakeupArtists WHERE experience_years > 5 AND availability = TRUE;
SELECT name, role FROM Dressers WHERE availability = TRUE ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT artist_id, name, experience_years FROM MakeupArtists WHERE experience_years <= 3 AND availability = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM stylists;
SELECT name, expertise FROM stylists WHERE expertise='Hair';
SELECT artist_id, name FROM makeup_artists ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT dresser_id, name, experience_years FROM dressers WHERE experience_years > 5;
SELECT start_time, end_time FROM schedules WHERE stylist_id=1;
SELECT * FROM stylists WHERE expertise = 'Hair Styling' ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT name, experience_years FROM dressers WHERE experience_years >= 5
SELECT name, specialty FROM makeup_artists WHERE specialty = 'Bridal Makeup' LIMIT 3 OFFSET 1

SELECT s.name AS stylist_name, a.name AS artist_name, d.name AS dresser_name FROM schedules sc INNER JOIN stylists s ON sc.stylist_id = s.stylist_id INNER JOIN makeup_artists a ON sc.artist_id = a.artist_id INNER JOIN dressers d ON sc.dresser_id = d.dresser_id WHERE sc.start_time > '2022-10-01 09:00:00' AND sc.end_time < '2022-10-01 12:00:00'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_schedules, MAX(DATEDIFF(end_time, start_time)) AS longest_duration FROM schedules
SELECT * FROM HairStylists;
SELECT stylist_name, stylist_contact FROM HairStylists WHERE stylist_id = 1;
SELECT show_name, show_location, show_date FROM FashionShows WHERE show_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT artist_name FROM MakeupArtists ORDER BY artist_name DESC;
SELECT show_name, artist_name, dresser_name FROM FashionShows JOIN BackstageSchedules ON FashionShows.show_id = BackstageSchedules.show_id;
SELECT stylist_name, stylist_contact FROM HairStylists;
SELECT * FROM MakeupArtists WHERE artist_name = 'Alice' OR artist_name = 'Bob';
SELECT show_name, show_date, show_location FROM FashionShows ORDER BY show_date DESC;
SELECT artist_name, artist_contact FROM MakeupArtists WHERE artist_contact LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT show_name, start_time, end_time FROM FashionShows JOIN BackstageSchedules ON FashionShows.show_id = BackstageSchedules.show_id;
